INSERT INTO evaluate (email,subjectID,evaluation,grade,quality,gradeSatis,difficulty,homework,coverage, testNum,score1,score2,score3,score4,average1,average2,average3,average4,rank1,rank2,rank3,rank4, commentFinal,commentTest,postTime,recommendNum) VALUES(#{email},#{subjectID},#{evaluation},#{grade},#{quality},#{gradeSatis},#{difficulty},#{homework},#{coverage}, #{testNum},#{score1},#{score2},#{score3},#{score4},#{average1},#{average2},#{average3},#{average4},#{rank1},#{rank2},#{rank3},#{rank4}, #{commentFinal},#{commentTest},NOW(),0); UPDATE schedule SET evaluateYN="Y" WHERE subjectID=#{subjectID} AND email=#{email};
SELECT * FROM evaluate WHERE email=#{email} AND subjectID=#{subjectID}

INSERT INTO recommendation(postNum,email,recommendDate) VALUES (#{postNum},#{email},NOW()); UPDATE evaluate SET recommendNum=(#{recommendNum}+1) WHERE postNum=#{postNum};
DELETE FROM recommendation WHERE postNum=#{postNum} AND email=#{email}; UPDATE evaluate SET recommendNum=(#{recommendNum}-1) WHERE postNum=#{postNum};
